title: Failure-Based Learning Strategy-Utilized Elementary Mathematics Leadership Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic mathematics education and managerial competencies
context.additional_context: For managers of elementary mathematics education programs in corporations, emphasizing reflective practice through failure case studies

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose root causes of elementary mathematics education failure cases with 80% accuracy in a VR simulation environment
Learners can iteratively propose educational design improvements using failure-based learning strategies at least three times
Learners can apply lessons derived from failure cases to team-based projects (5-person groups) at least twice using a peer feedback system
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
